Title: Prohibits any licensee who maintains, conducts or operates a parking lot or garage from increasing its schedule of rates by greater than ten percent over a twelve month period
Summary: Prohibits any licensee who maintains, conducts or operates a parking lot or garage from increasing its schedule of rates by greater than ten percent over a twelve month period.
LawCode: Amd ยง20-324, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting excess rate changes for parking garages
